runners.name: test loop
runners.script: while :; do echo test forever; done

runners.name: test loop rand
runners.script: while :; do echo test forever $RANDOM; done

runners.name: test pcs
runners.script: while :; do echo -n test; sleep 1; echo forever; sleep 1; done

runners.name: loop i
runners.script: i=0; while :; do echo test $i; let "i++"; sleep 0.1; done

runners.name: sudo test
runners.script: echo SUDO_ASKPASS: ${SUDO_ASKPASS}; sudo echo sudo test
